Yes, I'm talking about far fetched future. I just think browsers will replace OSes as a main platform for running apps.

I mean web (WebAssembly, WebGL) in general, not html5. Browser is becoming the new desktop with huge apps being developed as web apps instead of native desktop apps. It's not too far fetched to think that once the performance of browers improves we'll be seeing AAA games developed as web apps so they can be used on any platform as long as the browser supports it.
It's cross platform
